(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (JJ great)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB meet)
              (NP
                (NP (NN everyone))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBD turned)
                      (PRT (RP up))
                      (PP (IN for)
                        (NP
                          (NP (JJ last) (NNP Saturday) (POS 's))
                          (NN food) (NN photography) (NN workshop))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(great-3, It-1)
cop(great-3, was-2)
root(ROOT-0, great-3)
aux(meet-5, to-4)
xcomp(great-3, meet-5)
dobj(meet-5, everyone-6)
nsubj(turned-8, who-7)
rcmod(everyone-6, turned-8)
prt(turned-8, up-9)
prep(turned-8, for-10)
amod(Saturday-12, last-11)
poss(workshop-16, Saturday-12)
possessive(Saturday-12, 's-13)
nn(workshop-16, food-14)
nn(workshop-16, photography-15)
pobj(for-10, workshop-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP We))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG conducting)
            (NP (DT these) (NNS classes))
            (PP (IN since)
              (NP (CD 2008)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBG heartening)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB see)
                (S
                  (NP (DT that))
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN level))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN interest)))))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT this) (NN form))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NN photography))
                        (VP (VBG increasing)
                          (PP (IN through)
                            (NP (DT the) (NNS years))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(conducting-4, We-1)
aux(conducting-4, have-2)
aux(conducting-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, conducting-4)
det(classes-6, these-5)
dobj(conducting-4, classes-6)
prep(conducting-4, since-7)
pobj(since-7, 2008-8)
cc(conducting-4, and-9)
nsubj(heartening-12, it-10)
aux(heartening-12, is-11)
conj(conducting-4, heartening-12)
aux(see-14, to-13)
xcomp(heartening-12, see-14)
nsubj(level-17, that-15)
det(level-17, the-16)
xcomp(see-14, level-17)
prep(level-17, of-18)
pobj(of-18, interest-19)
prep(see-14, in-20)
det(form-22, this-21)
pobj(in-20, form-22)
prep(form-22, of-23)
pobj(of-23, photography-24)
partmod(photography-24, increasing-25)
prep(increasing-25, through-26)
det(years-28, the-27)
pobj(through-26, years-28)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (DT the) (NN past)))
    (NP (JJS most) (NNS people))
    (VP (VBD used)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB come)
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (JJ small) (JJ compact) (NNS cameras)))))
        (, ,)))))

  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ seems)

          (NP (NN everyone))
          (VP (VBZ has)
            (NP (DT a) (NN smartphone))))))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBP kick)

          (NP
            (NP
              (NP (DT this) (NN year) (POS 's))
              (NN series))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NN food) (NN photography) (NNS workshops))
                (PP (IN with)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN week) (JJ long) (NN food) (NN photography))))))

                (NP
                  (ADJP (RB specially) (VBN constructed))

                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN form))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN food) (NNS dioramas)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ Many))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (PRP them))))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (VP (VBN amazed)
        (PP (IN at)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (JJ simple) (NNS adjustments))
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS techniques))))
              (VP (MD can)
                (ADVP (RB drastically))
                (VP (VB change)
                  (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ final) (NNS photos)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubjpass(amazed-5, Many-1)
prep(Many-1, of-2)
pobj(of-2, them-3)
auxpass(amazed-5, were-4)
root(ROOT-0, amazed-5)
prep(amazed-5, at-6)
advmod(change-17, how-7)
det(adjustments-11, a-8)
amod(adjustments-11, few-9)
amod(adjustments-11, simple-10)
nsubj(change-17, adjustments-11)
prep(adjustments-11, to-12)
poss(techniques-14, their-13)
pobj(to-12, techniques-14)
aux(change-17, can-15)
advmod(change-17, drastically-16)
pcomp(at-6, change-17)
poss(photos-20, their-18)

dobj(change-17, photos-20)

  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB do)

        (PP (IN by)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB try)

          (S
            (VP (VBG taking)
              (NP

          (PRT (RP on)))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT All))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP need)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB submit)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN photo))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN food))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (VBD ate)
                          (PP (IN at)
                            (NP (NNP Millenia) (NNP Walk)))))
                      (CC and)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (VBP stand)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB win)
                                (NP (JJ attractive) (NNS prizes))
                                (PP (IN from)
                                  (NP (NNP Canon)
                                    (CC and)
                                    (NNP Millenia) (NNP Walk)))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(is-6, All-1)
nsubj(need-3, you-2)
rcmod(All-1, need-3)
aux(do-5, to-4)
xcomp(need-3, do-5)
root(ROOT-0, is-6)
aux(submit-8, to-7)
xcomp(is-6, submit-8)
det(photo-10, a-9)
dobj(submit-8, photo-10)
prep(photo-10, of-11)
det(food-13, the-12)
pobj(of-11, food-13)
nsubj(ate-15, you-14)
rcmod(food-13, ate-15)
prep(ate-15, at-16)
nn(Walk-18, Millenia-17)
pobj(at-16, Walk-18)
cc(ate-15, and-19)
nsubj(stand-21, you-20)
conj(ate-15, stand-21)
aux(win-23, to-22)
xcomp(stand-21, win-23)
